title: MCP Servers
description: The <0>Model Context Protocol</0> enables communication with locally running MCP servers that provide additional tools and resources to extend NeonTractor's capabilities. You can use <1>community-made servers</1> or ask NeonTractor to create new tools specific to your workflow (e.g., "add a tool that gets the latest npm docs").

enableToggle.title: Enable MCP Servers
enableToggle.description: Turn this ON to let NeonTractor use tools from connected MCP servers. This gives NeonTractor more capabilities. If you don't plan to use these extra tools, turn it OFF to help reduce API token costs.

enableServerCreation.title: Enable MCP Server Creation
enableServerCreation.description: Enable this to have NeonTractor help you build <1>new</1> custom MCP servers. <0>Learn about server creation</0>
enableServerCreation.hint: Hint: To reduce API token costs, disable this setting when you are not actively asking NeonTractor to create a new MCP server.

gateway.title: MCP Gateway Configuration
gateway.description: Configure connection to MCP Gateway for enhanced server management

enable.title: Enable MCP Gateway
enable.description: Turn this ON to enable MCP Gateway integration. This allows access to additional file processing tools like OCR.

apiKey.label: API Key
apiKey.placeholder: Enter your MCP Gateway API key

learnMoreEditingSettings: Learn more about editing MCP settings files

networkTimeout.label: Network Timeout
networkTimeout.description: Maximum time to wait for server responses

deleteDialog.title: Delete MCP Server
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete the MCP server "{{serverName}}"? This action cannot be undone.
